nodes.text: "Meet Zeev, a Pet Duuvhal" is a role-playing supplement that was written by Cory J. Herndon and published online by Wizards of the Coast in 2001. The article highlights Zeev, a duuvhal from Yashuvhu and pet to Valara Saar. The article was written in conjunction with "Meet Valara Saar: Force Adept".
